entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (ep3_rroow.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_240: If you are not busy, I need someone to run a package to Sera Jossi on the outskirts.
entries.s_244: Yes, she doesn't get into town very often and gets her food delivered but my usual courier isn't around.  Can you do it for me? Sera will pay you for the delivery I'm sure.
entries.s_248: If you travel east out of town you will find a path to your left that leads down to the river. She can usually be found around there.
entries.s_250: Yes, did you get the package delivered?
entries.s_254: Well hurry, she must be hungry by now.
entries.s_256: Have you visited the Rodian camps? I hear their hunts are most dangerous.
